summary: Jet Li stars in this comic spectacle as a Chinese "Robin Hood" who stumbles upon a kidnapping scheme after unwittingly opening a martial arts school next to a brothel!
cast: Jet Li|Man Cheung|Dicky Cheung|Pak-Cheung Chan|Ka-Yan Leung|Alan Chung San Chui|Chia-Hui Liu|Tiet Wo Chu|Anita Yuen|King-Tan Yuen|Isabel Leung|Tin-Yee Ka|Linda Cheung|Julie Lee|Chung-Shun Chu|Fat Chung|Mo Yuen|Jimmy Au|Man-Biu Pak|Tian-Lin Wang|Dion Lam|Wah-Lung Szema|Ho-Kai Law|Douglas Kung|Jackson Ng|Biu Gam|Ta Lei|Kwai-Bo Chun|Tau Chu|Kam Kong Chow|Roy Filler|Siu-Wah Chan|Chi-Hung Ling|Heng Li|Kwok-Kit Lam|Choi-Nam Yip|Mike V. Szuc|Wen-Hsiu Wu|Yuan-Chun Wu|Bing Lei Li
title: El último héroe en China
